entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InitializeComponent should cache the same Uris #4642
  • Properties folder doesn't show up in the .NET MAUI Blazor template #4641
  • MenuBar #4640
  • Remove the ExecutionMode Platform Specific from WebView #4638
  • MAUI csproj properties altered after project creation #4631
  • Can not bind Orientation in LinearItemsLayout #4628
  • Codesign fails for iOS target #4621

Closed

  • [Bug] Unable to build app over command line #2754
  • GetNamedSize - remove #3948
  • DisplayAlert crashes an app if executed in a page constructor #4336
  • Inside Stacklayout ScrollView not working #4176
  • Not found Microsoft.Maui.Essentials #3909
  • [Bug] Unable to start winUI app other than from the start menu #2750
  • Android SDK Manager and Device Manager are Not Opening in VS 2022 RC1 #2816
  • [Bug] The decryption operation failed, see inner exception #3112
  • [Net6][iOS] error MSB4044: The "ComputeBundleResourceOutputPaths" task was not given a value for the required parameter "BundleIdentifier". #3170
  • BasicBlazorComponentClick test fails on Android API 27 and earlier #4517
  • Developing MAUI Blazor Project on VM ware Work station or Hyper V #3613
  • Fresh MAUI project failing to deploy #3485
  • MAUI Blazor Template exception on runtime. #3344
  • MAUI Project Template Has Build Errors #3417
  • [Bug] Choose Target OS will create <TargetFramework>net6.0-android13.6</TargetFramework> in Project Property setting. #2767
  • [Bug] MAUI new template missing dependencies in IDE #2790
  • Multiple NU1603 warnings with Microsoft.Maui.Extensions 6.0.101-preview.9.1843 #2934
  • [Bug] Need recipe file #2942
  • [Bug] Assembly References Get Added to Every Platform TFM #2568
  • Add a gitignore file to the Maui template in VS 2022 #4131
  • [Bug] Project not selected to build for this solution configuration #2072
  • [Bug] There are no example NUnit or MSTest projects for testing Maui libraries using VS 2022 preview 4 #2594
  • [Bug] MAUI-Template: net6.0-ios is missing RuntimeIdentifier ios-arm64 #2979
  • Maui manifest is not signed at maui check at net 6.0.100 rc3 #3423
  • Boilerplate MAUI project on a clean 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 install doesn't compile; missing components #3624
  • Unable to install and run mauiapp1 deterministically #3174
  • [Bug] File -> New MAUI App does not compile #3204
  • Unable to run MAUI blazor project in Visual Studio 2022 Preview (latest - 11/08/2021) #3303
  • VS2022 17.0.1 P1 Can't build MAUI sample project #3416
  • .net MAUI app not building #3420
  • Error NU1605 after upgrading to 17.1.0 Preview 1.0 #3422
  • No maui project template in VS 2022 Version 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 #3822
  • not able build maui blazor or maui app project #3451
  • Default Maui projects giving various errors. It did work 4 days ago before the last update #3652
  • Maui App template - Windows - "The project doesn't know how to run the profile Windows Machine" #3725

PullRequests

Created

  • Check if FlyoutBackground hasn't been set #4639
  • [tests] Add Task.Delay to some unreliable tests #4637
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix cell parenting when using Retain Caching #4636
  • [iOS] Replace UIDevice.CheckSystemVersion checks #4635
  • Essentials.Geolocation WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4634
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.FileSystem WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4633
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.FilePicker WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4632
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Refactor Accelerometer into an interface #4630
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Battery refactored to interface and singleton #4629
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Implement RadioButton Border properties #4626
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Essentials.Email refactored to interface and singleton #4623
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Connectivity refactored to interface and singleton #4622
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Moved IPlatformServices.GetNamedSize into a separate service #4570
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Refactored Preferences into an Interface #4582
  • Run BlazorWebView tests only on Android API level 28+ #4625
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [ci] Allow to build agains internal sdks (#4591) #4624
  • [ci] Allow to build agains internal sdks #4591
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [ci] Provisionator channel as a parameter on the pipeline #4620
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Shell to default template #4524
    area/templates 📄
  • Renaming public APIs Native --> Platform #4599
    area/architecture
  • Implement InputTransparent property #4513
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Core] Implement SizeChanged event #4541
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-general
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [iOS] Add pending events in EntryHandler #4347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Add handling and tests for TextTransform for SearchBar/Editor/Entry #4554
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Implement Cookies property in WebView #4419
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Async Cancellation For WebView #3681
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Implement Border properties in RadioButtonHandler #4416
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Essentials.Clipboard refactored to interface and singleton #4612
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Barometer refactored to interface and singleton #4604
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.AppActions refactored to interface and singleton #4596
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
  • Essentials.Browser refactored to interface and singleton #4605
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Compass refactored to interface and singleton #4615
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS, Catalyst] Shell View Handler #4616
    area/shell 🐢
  • [X] Identify Setter property target in VSG case #4607
